description.p: After attacking with a one handed weapon you may make an unarmed strike as a bonus action.
If you do so, you do not add your ability modifier to the damage roll.
When making this attack, its damage dice is 1d4, unless another feature such as martial arts or natural weapons allows you to use another dice.
